translation.en: [Jake] My generation, we were born into war.
A gateway to another dimension at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean.
translation.ko: 태평양 심해 속 다른 차원과의 통로로…

translation.en: They were sent by an alien race on the other side, the Precursors.
So big, they needed two pilots to run 'em.
translation.ko: 예거는 너무 커서 파일럿 두 명이 필요했다

translation.en: He sacrificed himself to help save the world.
It's been 10 years since we won the war
But a few coastal cities never did.
And the world is still picking up the pieces.
But some of us live better in a broken world.
translation.ko: 나 같은 놈은 이 파괴된 세상이 더 좋다

translation.en: And squatting in half a mansion
is better than paying for some crappy apartment.
Now, in the relief zones, you have to get creative.
or somebody else might eat your breakfast.
translation.ko: 잔머릴 안 쓰면 내 밥그릇을 뺏긴다

translation.en: You know, out here, we place a different value on things.
The Pan Pacific Defense Corps usually looks the other way
as long as you don't go poking around where you don't belong.
Say, like a decommissioned Jaeger scrapyard.
translation.ko: 예컨대 퇴역한 예거의 고철 처리장 같은 곳

translation.en: And nothing pays more than stolen Jaeger tech.
translation.ko: 훔친 예거 부품만큼 돈 되는 것도 없다

translation.en: Plenty of nutcases out here trying to slap together their own Jaegers.
But they need the parts to do it.
So if you can steal what no one else can steal,
you can live like a king.
[Sonny] Are you sure it's in here?
[Jake] Power cores are stripped before they get decommissioned.
But sometimes they miss the tertiary plasma capacitors.
And that's a big score. This one's still holding a charge.
translation.ko: 그게 돈 돼 충전하면 쓸 수 있거든

translation.en: Let's just calm down. Let's not get excited.
I'm just playing the odds here.
You cheated Barada in Juarez, skipped out on Chau in Hong Kong.
And stole from me in my own backyard.
translation.ko: - 그건 오해야 - 내 물건도 훔쳤지 내 구역에서

translation.en: Now I'm stealing for you. Circle of life.
translation.ko: 그래서 갚잖아, 다 돌고 도는 거야

translation.en: Hey, man, uh, just a little situation.
translation.ko: - 타깃 조준 - 잠깐만 문제가 좀 생겼어

translation.en: it's supposed to be right there,
but you know what, let me just figure this out.
Somebody please kill this guy for me.
You, wait, wait! Someone else is in here. Someone else has the capacitor.
[man] Hey, boss, he went over here! [Sonny] Go, go, go, go!
[man] I see him. I see him.
[Sonny in muffled voice] Jake, you son of a...
translation.ko: "경고 문 위에 서지 말 것" 제이크, 이 망할…

translation.en: [Jake] Hey! Get back here with that!
-How old are you? -Old enough to kick your ass.
translation.ko: - 몇 살이니? - 너 패줄 만큼은 먹었다

translation.en: Let's take a second. Back up. Back up.
I think I can sell your little toy for a whole lot of money.
Scrapper's not a toy, and she's not for sale.
The man holding the pipe says she is. So listen up...
translation.ko: 쇠파이프 든 놈이 팔고 싶대 그러니까 잘 들어

translation.en: [Amara] Come on, come on, come on!
Whoa, whoa, whoa! Hey! Get out.
What are you doing? No, no, no.
The other cradle. A Jaeger needs two pilots.
Scrapper is small enough to run on a single neural lobe.
All right, then you get out, and you let me pilot.
-Told you she's not a toy. -You're gonna get us killed.
translation.ko: - 내가 장난감 아니랬지? - 이러다 우리 죽어

translation.en: -I can get us out of here. -I just got us out.
this is the Pan Pacific Defense Corps.
Power down and exit your Conn-Pod.
No, no, no. Don't, don't, don't. Don't give up.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 저 말 듣지 마

translation.en: You give up way too easy.
You're in violation of Code 10 Section 14.
Okay. What do you got? And I'm not getting out.
translation.ko: 그럼 방법이 있어? 난 절대 안 내려

translation.en: One of those ion cells redundant?
-But we need them. -Get up to Ajax's head.
[electronic voice] Low power warning. Twelve percent.
I told you we needed that!
How long before Ajax can reboot his systems?
translation.ko: 쟤 재부팅 하는 데 얼마큼 걸릴까?

translation.en: Look what you did to my Jaeger, you jerk!
Oh, like this is my fault?
-Yes. My command center. -Wait. Sorry, I didn't hear that.
And you had no place to come in and try to tell me what to do.
I go wherever I want. It's a different world. 'Cause it really worked out well, right? Look where we're at.
translation.ko: - 내 맘이다, 왜? - 맘대로 해서 꼴 좋다

translation.en: Your top lip and your bottom lip,
they need to meet and become friends. Smart. That's a good one.
They need to close up, all right? Shut up.
What happened to the shutting up?
You said you wasn't gonna sell it, so what the hell was you gonna do?
I built her because one day, they're gonna come back.
And when they do, I'm not gonna be stuck
waiting for someone else to come save my ass.
Look, it's just a stretch of bad luck. I'll figure it out.
Father used to say we make our own luck.
translation.ko: 아버지가 그러셨지 운은 자신이 만드는 거라고

translation.en: Yeah, well, Dad said a lot of things.
You were arrested in a rogue Jaeger.
Hold on a second. That wasn't my Jaeger. There's this little kid.
That's why I need my big sis to help me get the hell out of here.
translation.ko: 그러니까 누님께서 날 좀 빼내 줘

translation.en: They are not going to let you just walk. But there might be another way.
translation.ko: 그냥 나가긴 힘들겠지만 방법이 있을 수도 있지

translation.en: Okay. See, that's what I wanna hear. That's what I'm here to talk about, the other way.
translation.ko: 좋아, 그럼 그 방법에 대해 얘기해보자고

translation.en: Lay it on me. What do I gotta do?
Re-enlist and finish what you started.
I'm not doing that. Look, I'm too old to be a cadet.
translation.ko: 난 훈련병이 되기엔 나이가 너무 많아

translation.en: I don't want you to be a cadet. I want you to help train them.
Train who? Train what? I'm not training no damn kids.
translation.ko: 애들을 훈련하라고? 난 그런 거 안 해

translation.en: The transport is standing by to bring both of you to Moyulan.
translation.ko: 너희 둘을 모율란으로 데려올 수송기를 보냈어

translation.en: I can't believe she just hologrammed me.
[Jake] Yeah, look. I didn't have a choice.
[Amara] I know, I get it. But why me?
Why do they want me for the program?
You built and piloted your own Jaeger.
These people like that kind of stuff.
Okay, so then why am I just a cadet, and you get to be a ranger?
translation.ko: 그럼 왜 난 훈련병이고 당신은 레인저인데?

translation.en: I didn't believe it when they told me you were inbound.
You remember how that works, Ranger Pentecost.
And you must be Amara Namani.
Well, let's get you squared away.
Oh, and, uh, try not to steal anything while you're here.
translation.ko: 참, 여기선 뭐 훔칠 생각 마

translation.en: Did that haircut just call you Pentecost?
Pilot of Coyote Tango, hero of basically the whole world?
translation.ko: 코요테 탱고의 파일럿이자 전 세계의 영웅?

translation.en: You're late, you miss the day.
You fall behind, you'll be on the next transport back to wherever they found you.
translation.ko: 다음 수송기 타고 왔던 데로 돌아가야 해

translation.en: She's the fastest Jaeger in the fleet. Did you know that?
[woman over pa] Warning. Stand clear of lift.
Until his co-pilot got a better offer in the private sector.
Heard a lot about you, Pentecost.
Yeah? You know you still hold the record?
So how'd they lure you back? I mean, it couldn't have been the pay, so...
translation.ko: 왜 돌아온 거야? 보수도 쥐꼬리만 한데…

translation.en: Oh, yeah, it's a long story.
But if you want to talk about it, we can meet up...
-Oh! Come on, Renata, not the face! -Sorry, man.
Fold, Ilya. You need all the showers you can get, man.
translation.ko: 꼭 따서 샤워 좀 해라, 일리야

translation.en: I have a musk! What you smell is musk.
She'll be joining you in sim training bright and early.
He will be helping me instruct you until I can find a new co-pilot to replace Ranger Burke.
translation.ko: 새 부조종사를 구할 때까지 교육을 도와줄 거다

translation.en: Malikova, get Namani squared away and prepped for training.
We're gonna be trained by a Pentecost!
Not like he was the one who died helping close the Breach.
translation.ko: 쟤가 브리치를 닫다가 죽은 것도 아닌데

translation.en: He's never even been in combat.
[Suresh] Renata, let's go for round two.
Uh, hey. So where should I...
Heard you built your own little Jaeger.
I operated her, too, with this solo bay...
You want to put junk together, be a mechanic.
Hey, come on. I got ya.
So you and Vik already buddies, huh?
But you don't want to call her that.
Yeah. What's her problem? Took her three shots to pass the entrance test.
Yeah. Don't think she likes how you landed here.
Recruiters never come around back home.
I'll teach you some. Calms her down.
Come on. Let's get you squared away.
You know, when I heard you gave November Ajax a run for his money...
I thought we might have something here.
How am I supposed to drift in this thing?
I didn't ask for your excuses, Cadet.
You putting her up against Kaiju that almost killed veteran pilots,
Maybe she's not the only one that doesn't belong here.
See, Nate, I know you have a problem with me.
But come on. She's just a kid.
So were we. That's the point.
translation.ko: 우리도 어렸고 그 점이 중요한 거야

translation.en: You make stronger connections when you're young.
And that kind of bond makes for a better drift pilot.
Show our new recruit how it's done.
What the hell are you wearing?
Yeah, she told me it's nice to finally have someone with style around here.
Can't blame the girl. I'm sexy.
So one more time around, huh? To prove your old man wrong?
Nah, I just came back to see if your chin implant ever settled in.
translation.ko: 네 턱 보형물 잘 있나 궁금해서

translation.en: Well, I think it's settled in quite nicely.
Yeah. It's very commanding. Kids must love it.
-Jake, these kids, they look up to us. -Mmm-hmm.
We gotta show them that we can work together.
Well, the war ended 10 years ago, man. You just need to let that go. Just, woosah.
You have to understand your enemy's...
You have to understand your enemy's objective to know you've defeated them. We still don't.
translation.ko: 놈들이 온 목적을 알기 전엔 승리를 속단할 수 없어

translation.en: No. I can help you out with that.
translation.ko: 난 온 목적을 알 거 같은데?

translation.en: See, I'm thinking it has something to do with them sending giant monsters to kick the crap out of us.
translation.ko: 괴물을 보내 공격한 건 인간을 없애겠다는 거지

translation.en: No, no, no. The Precursors wouldn't send Kaiju
to flatten a few cities if they were trying to wipe us all out.
translation.ko: 몇 개 도시만 파괴하진 않았을 거야

translation.en: All right, look, Nate, I don't have a problem with you, man.
But I had to make a choice.
It was between your pretty face and prison.
How many damn toppings do you need?
Leave my toppings be, man. Don't mess with my damn toppings.
translation.ko: 토핑은 취향이야 이걸로 시비 걸지 마라

translation.en: So the cadets got like, what, a couple of months before they graduate?
Every time you want to say something soldiery to them, I'll just nod.
translation.ko: 네가 교육할 때마다 난 고갤 끄덕이거나

translation.en: Then before you know it, they get to be pilots.
-I get to get back to my life. -Great.
It may happen sooner than you think.
Big dog and pony show tomorrow.
Shao and her team are presenting this new drone program they have.
translation.ko: 드론이 쓸 만하면 우리의 존재 가치가

translation.en: You know, you can front all you want,
but you and I both know you could've been great.
translation.ko: 하지만 우린 좋은 팀이 될 수 있었어

translation.en: It's an honor to meet you.
Sorry. She doesn't do the whole hand shaking thing.
Dr. Newton Geiszler. Head of research and development for Shao Industries.
translation.ko: 전 샤오 산업 연구개발팀장 뉴턴 가이즐러 박사입니다

translation.en: -That's a nice firm grip you got there. -[all speaking Mandarin]
Ranger Lambert and I will get you set up ma'am.
That's a much better look on you.
Guess it's better than prison stripes. Barely.
[laughs] I'm sorry, is this him? It's gotta be him, right?
You're Stacker's kid. Hey, I'm Newt.
I was a big fan of your father's. Amazing speech writer, by the way.
Did you ever hear his one where he canceled the apocalypse?
-Hermann... -I was hoping you'd be tagging along.
I could use your help on an experiment I'm working on.
Now, this will only take a moment. I know how busy you are.
[Newton] Ah, come on, you can't impose on me.
I mean, we've been inside each other's heads, right?
If we hadn't yanked that intel out of that Kaiju's brain,
translation.ko: 우리가 카이주의 뇌에서 정보를 빼낸 덕에

translation.en: Raleigh would've never been able to close the Breach.
Now that was you! And that was me!
Technically more me, but any chance we could make this quick, or...
translation.ko: 내 덕이 더 크지만… 할 말이 뭔데?

translation.en: Deploying them into battle, it takes too much time.
The amount of damage a Kaiju can inflict before they've...
Ah, here. I think I've found a solution.
translation.ko: 여깄다! 근데 방법을 찾은 거 같아

translation.en: Hermann, you know I can never read your...
No. There's no fuel in the world with that kind of boost-to-mass ratio.
translation.ko: 세상에 그 정도 추진력을 가진 연료는 없어

translation.en: I've discovered Kaiju blood is highly reactive
when it's combined with rare earth elements. Cerium, lanthanum, gadolinium.
translation.ko: 세륨, 란타넘, 가돌리늄에 잘 반응하는 걸 발견했어

translation.en: You can't be fooling around with this stuff. You're gonna blow yourself up.
Now, no one knows more about Kaiju morphology than you!
If you could just take a look, please. No, Hermann, I gotta stop you.
Once my boss's drones are approved, deployment time, that's gonna be a non-issue.
translation.ko: 드론 사용 허가만 나면 출격 시간은 문제가 안 돼

translation.en: Within a year, buddy, we're gonna have drones everywhere.
translation.ko: 1년 안에 세상은 드론 천지가 될 거야

translation.en: Look, why don't we talk about it over dinner at my place?
Okay? You can finally meet Alice.
I don't need a hot meal, Newton.
What I need is a solution to a very specific problem.
Ah, that's me, bud. I'm sorry.
Duty calls. It's been nice catching up.
when we drifted with that disgusting Kaiju brain.
translation.ko: 드리프트 해서 본 그 끔찍한 광경을…

translation.en: But it was a hell of a rush, wasn't it?
You and Dr. Gottlieb were close, weren't you?
Your Mandarin makes you sound like an idiot.
I know, I'm terrible. Uh, yes, we shared a lab together.
What were you and Dr. Gottlieb talking about?
Some crazy idea he had about thruster pods on a Jaeger.
translation.ko: 예거에 추진기를 달자는 황당한 소릴 하더군요

translation.en: Until Secretary General Mori makes her recommendation at the Council Summit,
Could you say that again and this time about 80% slower?
[in English] I said, don't make me question your loyalty.
-I barely talk to the guy anyway. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Then it won't be a problem.
I don't like to repeat myself.
translation.ko: 두 번 말하는 거 짜증 나

translation.en: [in English] My drones are the next step in Jaeger evolution.
processes commands through a quantum data core.
This means that a single pilot can operate the drone remotely
translation.ko: 파일럿 한 명이 세상 어디서든 원격 링크로

translation.en: As soon as the council approves deployment
based on Secretary General Mori's final report,
the days of struggling to find and train drift compatible pilots
translation.ko: 드리프트에 적합한 파일럿을 발굴, 훈련하는 일은

translation.en: will be a thing of the past.
And you think a bunch of desk jockeys are better than us?
We are not here to shut you down.
Cooperation between our programs has never been more vital.
translation.ko: 되려 양쪽의 협조가 어느 때보다 필요하죠

translation.en: If there are any questions. [man] Yeah, I got a question right over here.
We are pilots. Not a bunch of office workers!
And now we're shouting. There's no need to shout.
So how long until all this is shut down, so I can go home?
translation.ko: 여기 언제 폐쇄해? 나 집에 가게

translation.en: I don't trust the tech. Not yet at least.
It looks pretty good to me.
Remote systems can be hacked or compromised.
translation.ko: 원격 시스템은 언제든지 해킹될 수 있어

translation.en: No, you've got the key vote, right?
So there you go. It's your decision.
I wish I could just go ahead and approve them.
Nearly half the council is backing Liwen.
They aren't going to like my decision.
translation.ko: 내 결정을 달가워 안 할 거야

translation.en: Who cares what they like and what they don't like?
I tell you what, I'm gonna go with you.
Plus I wanna get out of this place.
because I already requested Gipsy Avenger
as honor guard at the Council Summit.
His co-pilot works for Liwen now. He needs a new one.
translation.ko: 부조종사를 리웬이 스카우트해가서 새로 구해야 해

translation.en: One that you already know is drift compatible.
I'll do it. I got your back.
But I wanna be there when you tell Nate because I just wanna see his face. He's gonna be so pissed.
translation.ko: 그 말할 때 같이 가 걔 열 받는 거 보게

translation.en: He's just gonna stand there like,
[in American accent] "Yeah, I don't think you belong in a Jaeger, Jake.
He is handsome. He is sexy.
[news anchor 1] Welcome back. Lots of sunshine today to kick off our weekend.
Peter Overton broadcasting from the Nine Studios in Sydney...
[news anchor 2] So far, police say at least 49 officers injured.
[news anchor 3] Kaiju worshipers in black masks throwing bottles and rocks.
PPDC Security in riot gear are attempting to...
translation.ko: 진압복을 입은 방위대 요원들이… "명예 가드 예거, 회담장 도착"

translation.en: [on radio] Gipsy Avenger, this is Marshal Quan.
All you have to do is stand there and look pretty.
translation.ko: 자네들은 그냥 폼 잡고 서 있으면 돼

translation.en: Stay focused, try not to fall over.
Relax. It's coming back to me.
We're in each other's heads, remember?
So I'd appreciate it if you'd stop thinking about Jules. Not gonna happen.
translation.ko: 그러니까 줄스 생각은 그만해 넌 어차피 안 돼

translation.en: How about you stop thinking about kicking my ass?
translation.ko: 너도 나 때리는 상상 하지 마

translation.en: -Gonna be a long day. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Neural handshake is weak, but holding.
[woman on radio] Your ETA to zero is two minutes.
translation.ko: "드론 - 예거 호환 가능성" 2분 후 착륙 예정

translation.en: -[electronic voice] Warning. -Gipsy to Command. You reading this?
Be advised. We have a rogue Jaeger.
power down and exit your Conn-Pod immediately.
I repeat. Power down, and exit your Conn-Pods now.
-[electronic voice] Low power warning. -We're losing power!
Jake! That Jaeger's power reading is...
She's going down! We've gotta move!
Mayday! Mayday! Mayday! This is Mike, Mike, Charlie, 0-5-2.
We have been hit, and we are going down!

translation.ko: - 드리프트 정렬 실패 - 뇌 어쩌고 하는 거!

translation.en: So, I'm not really good at emotional stuff, but...
translation.ko: 난 감정을 표현하는 거 잘 못 하지만

translation.en: I really am sorry about your sister.
Yeah, her family died during the Onibaba attack.
She was my sister. My family.
translation.ko: 그 뒤 내 누나, 내 가족이 됐지

translation.en: Why are you out of uniform?
Just had a lot on my mind after Sydney.
I guess I just wanted to be comfortable.
Well, don't let Ranger Lambert see you in that.
He might take the stick out of his butt and beat you with it.
translation.ko: 어깨 뽕 빼서 그걸로 때릴 거야

translation.en: I think I'm safe. It's wedged in there pretty tight.
translation.ko: 괜찮아 걔 어깨 뽕은 박제된 거라…

translation.en: Yeah. And I can't drift with her for some reason.
translation.ko: 응, 근데 난 세라와 드리프트가 안 돼

translation.en: All the other cadets have been training for years, and I just...
translation.ko: 딴 애들은 훈련을 몇 년 받았지만 난…

translation.en: I hate feeling like the slow kid. You gotta relax.
Or you're just grinding gears. I'll help you out.
We have to make a good connection.
You can't do that if you're yappin' your gums.
Let's see if we're drift compatible.
[Amara's father] Come on, Amara, get him!
Remember, the stronger your connection, the better you fight.
translation.ko: 명심해, 접속이 강할수록 잘 싸울 수 있어

translation.en: [Amara's father] Amara! Come on, jump! Jump to me, baby!
You have to, Amara, come on! Jump!
Amara! Don't hang on to the memory.
Just let it flow right through you. Amara!
Yeah, come on. Get together. Ready? One, two...
translation.ko: 더 바싹 붙어, 찍는다, 하나, 둘

translation.en: Amara. Amara, you need to let it go. Amara!
Look, just listen to my voice! Amara!
-Amara! We need to break the drift! -Jump to me! Come on!
translation.ko: - 아마라, 접속을 끊어야 해 - 뛰어, 어서!

translation.en: Baby, I will catch you! I promise. Come on!
[Nate] Jake, it's me. Are you there?
Meet me in the lab right away. Marshal wants to see us.
[Jake] What is it? [Marshal Quan] A message. From Mako.
[Hermann] She was trying to send it from her copter right before it went down.
It's a data package. High density.
Obsidian Fury was jamming comms. How could her signal get through?
It didn't. At least not intact.
[Hermann] "Gone" is relative in the digital realm. By running a modified fractal algorithm,
translation.ko: 응, 근데 유사 반복 알고리즘을 실행하면

translation.en: I might be able to reconstruct a few megabytes.
translation.ko: 몇 메가바이트는 살릴 수 있을지도 몰라

translation.en: I'm checking against PPDC Kaiju archives.
Keep looking. Whatever this is, it was important to her.
translation.ko: 계속 찾아봐요 그 자료를 보내려고 한

translation.en: I want to know why. And I want to know who was piloting that rogue Jaeger.
translation.ko: 이유를 알아야 해요 그 예거의 파일럿이 누군지도…

translation.en: Hey. [chuckles] Sorry I'm late. -I thought you were still in Sydney. -[speaking in Mandarin]
translation.ko: 늦어서 죄송해요 아직 시드니에 계신 줄 알고…

translation.en: The council has approved Drone deployment in an emergency session.
Thought you'd be a little more enthusiastic, doc.
Yeah, no, I'm pumped. This is great.
It's just the timing of everything with the attack and all, feels a little...
translation.ko: 단지 공격 타이밍이라든가 모든 게 좀…

translation.en: I was there. I know what happened.
translation.ko: 난 그 자리에서 모든 상황을 지켜봤어

translation.en: If our Drones had been in the field.
-Yeah. Uh, I guess they do. -[speaking in Mandarin]
Which means the attack was positive...
If you look at it sideways, and you squint,
then maybe you could say that. Uh...
-I'm sorry, what is going on here? -[speaking Mandarin]
The council expects full deployment in 48 hours.
I've worked my whole life for this.
Okay. Yeah. Not a problem. -That'll be fine. -[speaking Mandarin]
You don't think there's a way? All right, well, then you're fired.
Or maybe you're promoted. I don't know. We'll see how it goes. Just get it done!
Sorry I'm late. God, things were...
Things were crazy today with what happened in Sydney.
All those people, it was not pretty.
My boss almost got killed. That could've been bad.
translation.ko: 보스가 죽을 뻔했어 큰일 날 뻔했지

translation.en: Maybe. I guess, I don't know.
That would've been great actually, that one is all over me.
I mean, I can't get a break from her!
And enough about her, really, I should be focused on you.
How about we have a little fun in the bedroom?
Oh, that's great. Yeah, that's exciting.
Well, [clears throat] what can I say?
There's never been a rogue like this.
News feed said they were posting a dozen Jaegers at the memorial.
translation.ko: 예거 열 몇 대를 장례식장에 세운대

translation.en: When I die, I want that many to send me off.
Your pop's gonna make you work with boobs when you wash out.
Jaegers do not show up when the boob guy dies.
Wait, your dad works with boobs?
He's a plastic surgeon. He doesn't just work with...
I'm not gonna wash out. I'm gonna be a pilot.
translation.ko: 난 안 잘려, 꼭 파일럿이 될 거야

translation.en: Still. You die, meh, I post one Jaeger at your funeral.
translation.ko: 너 죽으면 장례식장에 예거 한 대 보내줄게

translation.en: I heard that's where they found Amara. In half a Jaeger.
I worked every day of my life to be here. You didn't do anything.
You were just picked up off the street, like garbage!
You know where I learned that?
On the streets, you big, dumb...

translation.ko: - 얘가 먼저 덤볐어요 - 얜 여기 안 맞아요!

translation.en: You know, when I first joined the Corps, I was just like you.
translation.ko: 나도 방위대에 들어왔을 때 너희 같았어

translation.en: But that woman we laid to rest today, Mako Mori,
translation.ko: 하지만 오늘 떠난 마코 모리가 말했어

translation.en: the minute you enter this program, you join a family.
And no matter what they do,
no matter how stupid they may act sometimes,
you forgive 'em, and you move on."
So you start believing that. In here.
And you'll start believing it in a Jaeger.
Marshal's looking for you guys. Says Gottlieb found something.
translation.ko: 대장이 찾아 가틀립이 뭘 알아냈나 봐

translation.en: Severnaya Zemlya. Off Siberia's Taymyr Peninsula.
A facility roughly in this location
was used to manufacture Jaeger power cores earlier in the war,
translation.ko: 예거의 동력 핵심기관을 만들던 이곳의 공장이 몇 년 전 폐쇄됐어요

translation.en: but it was decommissioned years ago.
translation.ko: 이곳의 공장이 몇 년 전 폐쇄됐어요

translation.en: Why would Mako be trying to tell us about an abandoned factory
Sir, permission to take Gipsy Avenger to see what the hell's out there.
translation.ko: 대장님, 집시 어벤저를 몰고 그쪽을 둘러보고 오겠습니다

translation.en: [sighs] Looks like Mako's message was a dead end.
-[alarm blaring] -We gotta get out of here!
I think we pissed him off.
get the hell out of your Conn-Pod.
A secondary brain used to control the hindquarters.
translation.ko: 몸의 후면을 관장하는 두 번째 뇌

translation.en: How'd they get into our world?
There hasn't been a breach in 10 years.
I don't think there was a breach.
Kaiju flesh has a distinct radioactive half-life signature.
translation.ko: 카이주의 몸엔 방사능 반감기의 흔적이 있죠

translation.en: Particular to the Anteverse. This specimen does not.
translation.ko: 앤트버스에만 있는… 근데 이 종은 없어요

translation.en: Okay, so, you're saying that it's from our universe?
The genetic fingerprints indicate distinctly terrestrial modification techniques,
translation.ko: 전쟁 때 남아있던 카이주의 세포를 채취

translation.en: probably engineered from Kaiju flesh left over from the war.
translation.ko: 지구의 유전자 기술로 조작한 거 같아

translation.en: Oh, my God. That hunk of slimy crap was piloting Obsidian Fury?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 그 똥 덩어리 같은 게 옵시디언 퓨리를 조종한 거야?

translation.en: -[Amara] We gotta get a look inside. -Inside?
When are we ever gonna get a chance to see something like this again?
translation.ko: 그런 걸 볼 기회가 언제 또 오겠어?

translation.en: You guys can stay here. I'm going.
[Suresh] Guys, guys, we should not be in here.
It's fused all the way through the system.
[Jinhai] That's how it was able to move like it did. Cool.
translation.ko: 그래서 그렇게 움직일 수 있었군, 대박

translation.en: Working with boobs is sounding better and better.
translation.ko: 찌찌 공장에서 일하는 게 백 배 낫겠다

translation.en: Yeah, let's just go yank on the guts of the weird-ass Kaiju killbot.
translation.ko: 카이주가 조종하던 로봇의 내장을 당겨서 뭐하게?

translation.en: -I told you not to yank on those. -Go get help! Go!
translation.ko: - 그거 당기지 말랬잖아 - 누구 좀 불러와, 어서!

translation.en: This goes way past what she did. [Marshal Quan] The decision has been made.
Security will take it from here. We're done.
He's got some scarring, but, yeah, he'll live. Marshal put him on probation.
Meilin and Suresh, too. They blink wrong, all of 'em are out.
No, it's not their fault. I talked them into it.
I'm sorry, I tried to talk to the Marshal,
but you're dismissed from the program.
You know, I used to say the same thing a long time ago.
But I actually didn't wanna be here. Still don't.
We were at war. And my dad was leading the charge, and I thought
maybe I could see more of him.
Well, one night, me and Nate got into it.
It was over something stupid. I can't even remember what.
So, I climbed in an old Mark IV,
just to show him I didn't need him to be a great pilot.
translation.ko: 혼자 할 수 있다는 걸 보여주려고

translation.en: About seven steps. Take or leave. How far did you get?
About two steps, and I blacked out from the strain.
And the first thing I saw when I woke up was my dad,
just standing right in front of me, looking stern.
He said I was out of the program.
He said I didn't deserve to be in a Jaeger. Look, he said a lot of things.
translation.ko: '넌 예거를 탈 자격이 없다' 그런 말들

translation.en: A year later, my dad was gone.
And I didn't get a chance to prove him wrong.
translation.ko: 아버지가 틀렸음을 입증할 기회를 잃은 거야

translation.en: More importantly, I didn’t get a chance to prove it to myself.
translation.ko: 아버지가 틀렸음을 입증할 기회를 잃은 거야 나 자신에게 입증할 기회도

translation.en: Don't let what other people think of you define who you are.
You won't like where that takes you. Do you understand?
And you might just be as good-looking as me in this type of situation. -[laughs] -Seriously.
translation.ko: 그럼 위기에서도 나처럼 멋있을 수 있어

translation.en: This face is set up well. Beauty is a burden.
translation.ko: 내가 한 미모 하잖아 너무 잘생겨서 짜증 나

translation.en: Obsidian Fury has tech in it made by Shao Industries.
translation.ko: 옵시디언 퓨리엔 그 회사의 기술이 투입됐어

translation.en: Jules and her team scanned every centimeter of that Jaeger.
translation.ko: 그 예거는 줄스 팀이 다 점검했어

translation.en: Insulating meta materials wound counter-clockwise in the shunt cabling.
translation.ko: 절연성 메타물질이 케이블을 왼쪽으로 감고 있었어

translation.en: Shao's the only company that winds them that way.
Amara, are you sure about what you're telling me right now? Yes.
Yeah. I stole a ton to make Scrapper.
translation.ko: 그래, 나 스크래퍼 만드느라 케이블을 몇 톤은 훔쳐봤어

translation.en: I thought it might be important.
Shao Industries? They don't even have a bio-division.
translation.ko: 샤오 산업? 거긴 바이오 부서도 없어

translation.en: Yeah, not that we know of.
Cabling could have been stolen, just like in Amara's Jaeger.
translation.ko: 아마라처럼 케이블을 훔친 걸 수도 있지

translation.en: We're gonna need more than that to connect Fury to Shao.
He'd have access to the internal records, the shipping manifests.
translation.ko: 내부 자료와 선적 목록을 볼 수 있을 거야

translation.en: All right, go see him. Keep a low profile.
translation.ko: 가서 만나봐요 남의 눈에 안 띄게…

translation.en: We'll take what we know to the Marshal.
No visitors without the proper credentials.
I don't want anyone interfering with deployment.
[Jinhai] I'm sorry. You don't deserve this.
-And we have delivery at 100%, people. -System online.
A hundred percent! That's the way that it's done, okay?
I told you we could do it, and we did it!
[Marshal Quan] We'll take what we know to the council in person.
The Drones in the field are malfunctioning!
Stop the ones coming in from deploying!
[over pa] All pilots, man your Jaegers and engage hostiles!
translation.ko: 전 파일럿, 예거에 탑승 전투 준비하라!

translation.en: Okay, you got this. You cool? Yeah, super cool. Just stay calm...
translation.ko: 뉴턴, 잘할 수 있지? 그래, 침착해

translation.en: Dr. Geiszler! Shao's looking for you.
I know! I'm heading up. I'm heading right...
Hermann. What are you doing here? How'd you get in here?
I do have PPDC credentials. And besides, everyone else seems a little bit preoccupied
with the killer drones your boss just set off!
She lured you with money and a fancy title. No. No way.
While you were basking in the glow,
she took your research and she twisted it.
Help me stop her, Newton. Help me save the world like old times.
translation.ko: 그 여잘 막게 도와줘 예전처럼 내가 세상을 구하게!

translation.en: All right, technically, you were helping me last time. Let's get that straight.
translation.ko: 말은 똑바로 해 그땐 네가 날 도와준 거야

translation.en: Fine. Help me help you save the world.
translation.ko: 알았어, 네가 세상을 구하도록 돕게 해줘

translation.en: God damn it, why can't I get this language?
No, they're drones from Shao Industries.
-What are they doing? -I don't know! They just went crazy!
Get back to your quarters right now!
Go! Get the hell out of here! Come on! Go, go!
Come on. Come on, come on. Get up.
Next time, why don't you learn how to use a gun? Take that!
I'd hug you if I didn't have a rule about public displays of affection.
Okay! All right. If you're done groping me?
Let's take care of the drones, right? All right, good.
Everyone, get out of the lab or I will shoot you!
-I will shoot you twice! -[speaking in Mandarin]
What do we do? How do we stop this?
just in case I wanna get in here and poke around down the road.
What I've been planning the last 10 years.
Where the hell are my pilots?!
Breaches detected, multiple locations! It's the Drones, sir!
Drones in the field are opening multiple breaches across the Pacific Rim!
translation.ko: 드론이 환태평양 곳곳에 브리치를 열고 있어

translation.en: Why would I do this? Hmm.
I guess I wouldn't. Not normally, not really my style.
translation.ko: 글쎄, 난 원래 이런 스타일이 아닌데

translation.en: Yeah, no, I don't know, maybe I hate you all
for treating me like an insignificant, little joke of a man.
Maybe that's why he did it, Hermann. I did it.
translation.ko: 걔가, 아니 내가 열 받은 거지

translation.en: I'm just not feeling totally myself these days.
translation.ko: 왠지 꼭 딴사람이 된 거 같아

translation.en: Very good, Hermann, you figured it out.
And as usual, a step behind.
-You must stop. -No, there's no point in fighting them.
-You must fight back. -I'm not strong enough, Hermann.
-Please. You must! -I am not strong enough.
None of you are strong enough!
You're not going to ruin my life's work.
The hell are you doing here? I told you to get to quarters!
All the doors are blocked! What do we do?
How did you do it without me knowing?
translation.ko: 어떻게 나 몰래 이런 짓을 해?

translation.en: I mean, 38% of your company is fully automated.
It really wasn't very hard to reallocate a little over here
And slip in a little Kaiju surprise without you noticing.

translation.ko: 넌 네가 제일 똑똑한 줄 알지?

translation.en: you were the smartest person in the room.
In about a second, I'm going to be.
[Hermann] Stop! Wait, wait, wait. Newt's not in control of himself!
It isn't him! It's the Precursors.
They must've infected his mind when we drifted with the Kaiju.
translation.ko: 카이주와 드리프트 할 때 감염됐나 봐요

translation.en: Security, find and detain Dr. Geiszler.
If he tries to resist, put a bullet in his head.
Stay here! We're gonna try and get to Gipsy.
We're under attack. You need to force Liwen
-to shut down the drones! -It isn't her.
translation.ko: 공격받고 있어요 드론을 멈추게 해줘요 리웬이 한 게 아냐 모두 뉴턴의 짓이었어

translation.en: It isn't Liwen. It was Newt.
translation.ko: 리웬이 한 게 아냐 모두 뉴턴의 짓이었어

translation.en: The Precursors, they've infected him. They're controlling his mind.
Gottlieb, can you get him to disable the drones?
-Gottlieb, shut them down. -[Liwen speaking in Mandarin]
It's trying to lock you out.
[Jake] Gottlieb, what the hell is going on? Gottlieb!
Gottlieb, shut them down or we're gonna die!
The breaches are closed. I repeat, the breaches are closed.
South Korea, Russian coast, and East China Sea.
We're gonna need all the help we can get.
All right, what do we got?
The reports are still coming in, but drones took out Jaegers and Shatterdomes across the Rim.
All right. How many Jaegers do we have here?
Okay. We need more Jaegers up and running or this is gonna be a short fight.
Even if we can, all of our other pilots are either dead or severely injured.
One disaster at a time. Let's just focus on those Jaegers.
I need you to help Jules with the repairs. Can you do that?
I thought I was kicked out.
She's pretty good at turning junk into Jaegers. You good with that?
translation.ko: 쟤 고철로 예거 잘 만들어 불만 없지?

translation.en: [Jake] All right. We got a lot of work to do
and not a lot of time.
I took the liberty of assigning the designations.
Well, the spiky guy and the big idiot are moving away from the cities and towards the ocean.
translation.ko: 뾰족이랑 덩치 큰 놈은 바다 쪽으로 가고 있어요

translation.en: Maybe they're trying to link up with Hakuja in the East China Sea.
Yeah, I bet Newt would know what they're up to,
if we can get it out of him.
Yeah, we'd have to find him first.
Any Jaegers closer to those Kaiju than us?
What was left of the Chin-do and Sakhalinsk domes tried to intercept. Emphasis on "tried."
I'm afraid we're on our own. [Nate] There's gotta be something here.
Something in the East China Sea.
Maybe that's not where they're headed.
Pull up a map of Kaiju movement from the war.
What, do you know something we don't?
You said we need to understand our enemy's objective
What if the Kaiju weren't blindly attacking our cities during the war?
translation.ko: 무작정 도시를 공격한 게 아니었을 수도 있어

translation.en: What if we were just in their way?
Extrapolate for Hakuja, Shrikethorn and Raijin.
Mount Fuji is a volcano rich in rare earth elements.
Kaiju blood reacts extremely violently with rare earth elements
translation.ko: 카이주의 피는 희토류 원소에 강하게 반응해

translation.en: is the basis of my fuel-thruster experiments. Excuse me.
translation.ko: 그걸 토대로 난 추진기 실험을 했고!

translation.en: -Whoa. That sounds bad. That's bad, right? -Very.
Mount Fuji's active. A geological pressure point.
Based on the blood to mass ratio of the Kaiju,
the reaction would cause a cascade event,
igniting the Ring of Fire around the Pacific Rim.
Billions of tons of toxic gas and ash will spew into the atmosphere,
translation.ko: 그럼 수십억 톤의 유독 가스와 화산재가 대기에 퍼져

translation.en: [Liwen] And finish terraforming the Earth for the Precursors.
translation.ko: 그리고 지구는 테라포밍되겠지 프리커서들이 살 수 있게…

translation.en: We can't let them reach Mount Fuji.
I'm gonna check with Jules for Jaeger repairs.
Even if we had a hundred Jaegers, there's no way to intercept in time.
translation.ko: 예거 수백 대가 있어도 제때 막긴 힘들어

translation.en: Oh, no, no, no. They're not ready.
Well, in theory, maybe, with your help.
Gottlieb, what does that mean, "in theory"?
[electronic voice] Power partially restored in sectors two...
Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo and Bracer Phoenix are good to go.
translation.ko: 세이버 아테나, 가디언 브라보 브레이서 피닉스는 준비됐어

translation.en: It's not a lot to work with.
Liwen can patch some Fury tech into Gipsy that might help.
We got four Jaegers against two Category-Fours and a Fiver.
translation.ko: 예거 네 대로 4, 5등급 세 놈과 싸워야 해

translation.en: If my dad was here, he'd probably give you a big speech.
I'm not a hero like he was.
But they didn't start out that way.
They started out as cadets, just like you.
We remember them as giants because they stood tall.
translation.ko: 그들이 위대한 건 위기에 굴하지 않고

translation.en: It doesn't matter who your parents are,
where you came from, who believed in you and who didn't.
And we are Earth's last defense.
This is our time, this is our chance to make a difference.
Now let's mount up and get it done!
Now help me save the world.
So, how does it feel to be in a real Jaeger?
All right, all Jaegers sound off. Go-no-go for launch.
Command, we are go for launch.
My grandmother used to play it for me.
What about me? Not calm, man, not calm.
translation.ko: 난 아냐, 더 심란해, 제발 꺼!

translation.en: Everyone in the city is secured in underground shelters.
Bracer Phoenix, on me. We'll take Raijin.
It's our turn to save the world.
[Hermann] Gipsy, Raijin's face plates are absorbing the hits and throwing the energy back at you!
translation.ko: 얼굴 뼈로 충격을 흡수해서 그 에너지로 반격하고 있어

translation.en: How many buildings can this thing take?
translation.ko: 건물 몇 채의 무게까지 견디는 거야?

translation.en: Hey, guys, we could use a little help over here! Right now!
translation.ko: 다들 와서 좀 도와줘! 지금 당장!

translation.en: Saber Athena, Guardian Bravo coming to assist!
translation.ko: 세이버 아테나! 가디언 브라보가 지금 간다!

translation.en: [Suresh] Yeah, that's right! You better run!
Okay, we're going with giant robots again.
We've got movement! Multiple hostiles, three kilometers southeast.
That's one of my automated factories.
It was Newt. He's in Tokyo.
Hostiles, one klick away and closing fast!
Let's go, all right, go, go, go! Go, baby, go, baby!
advance and fire everything you've got on my command!
Do you copy? Come on, guys, sound off!
translation.ko: 내 말 들리나? 빨리 상황 보고해!

translation.en: [Nate] Guardian Bravo, give me a sitrep. You guys okay?
You just stay put, and we'll send you help as soon as we can.
We're a little banged up, but we're still in the fight.
translation.ko: 피해는 좀 입었지만 계속 싸울 겁니다

translation.en: Saber, Bracer, prepare to intercept at the following coordinates.
translation.ko: 둘 다 다음 좌표에서 교전할 준비해

translation.en: Let's finish this. Move your ass. And don't be late.
do you have a tactical scan of the hostile?
We have it, Gipsy, but it's still compiling.
[Jake] No time. Can you locate the brains?
translation.ko: 시간 없어, 뇌의 위치 알 수 있나?

translation.en: Hostile's central brain mass is heavily armored. Your weapons won't be able to penetrate.
translation.ko: 뇌가 중무장돼 있어서 너희 무기론 못 뚫어

translation.en: What about a secondary brain? This son of a bitch have one of those?
translation.ko: 두 번째 뇌는요? 이놈도 두 번째 뇌가 있나?
놈은 두 번째 뇌가 세 개야

translation.en: All right, team, follow my lead and stay alert!
Fire up some of that Fury tech Liwen grabbed us.
[electronic voice] Warning. Neural load exceeding limit.
[Jake] Nate, stay with me! Stay with me!
Get up from that, you pile of junk!
Liwen! Is there anything you can do to help?
translation.ko: 리웬! - 도와줄 방법 없어요? - 시간이 더 필요해요!
- 도와줄 방법 없어요? - 시간이 더 필요해요!

translation.en: -If the hostile reaches Mount Fuji... -[Jake] Understood.
Jake, you can't operate Gipsy without a co-pilot!
translation.ko: 자네 혼자선 집시를 조종 못 해!

translation.en: The strain will tear your mind apart!
Getting the hell out of your way.
Stand by, Command. Initiating neural handshake.
Yeah, that was supposed to be epic,
[electronic voice] Warning. Cascade failure. Multiple systems offline.
translation.ko: 경고, 연쇄적 결함 발생 복합적 시스템 오류

translation.en: Hostile is two kilometers from the summit of Mount Fuji and closing fast!
translation.ko: 적이 후지산 정상 2km 밖에서 빠르게 접근 중

translation.en: Gottlieb, do you have enough fuel left in your thrusters to launch us into the atmosphere?
translation.ko: 가틀립, 우릴 대기권으로 쏴줄 만큼 연료 충분해요?

translation.en: Possibly, but there won't be enough to slow your reentry.
[Jake] We don't need to slow down.
We're gonna drop Gipsy right on top of that thing.
I just ejected my escape pod.
Yeah. We'll have to use mine.
Jake, there's only one thruster with enough fuel remaining.
Remote systems are online. Sending help!
[Jake] Come on, come on! Move them little legs!
The thruster's way too strong, there's no way we can hold on to it!
translation.ko: 추진력이 세서 우리 힘으론 못 잡아

translation.en: I can weld it to your hand.
Nice. I was actually gonna do that.
We only got one shot at this.
Yeah! Then let's make it count.
Stay there! You're an extra ton we can drop on that thing!
translation.ko: 거기 있어요! 그 무게를 이용해야 해

translation.en: Jake, Amara, you need to eject!
I will catch you! I promise!
Gipsy to Command, we're getting the hell out of here!
We got to save the world.
Twenty kilometers to impact. Get out of there!
Plan B. Always a Plan B.
Be advised, we just caught ourselves a Newt.
I'm glad you're still okay, man.
[Nate panting] You, too, brother. I knew you could do it.
translation.ko: 너도, 브라더 네가 해낼 줄 알았어

translation.en: Well, I had a lot of help.
So out of all the things to notice right now, you're noticing snow?
Big, dead Kaiju is right there.
-Okay, okay, all right. -And I'm not sure if you're...
Is this the part where you're gonna give me one of those big, dumb speeches?
translation.ko: 또 그 지루한 연설 하려고 그러지?

translation.en: Did everyone think it was dumb, or is that just your opinion...
Just be honest. How many times did you practice that in front of the mirror?
It was motivational. You can be whoever you wanna be.
-I'm a natural at this. -No, you're not a natural because...
Oh! Give me a break. I've never done this before!
You think this is over, huh?
You think you've saved your crappy little world?
We are never going to stop
and sooner or later [distorted] your luck is going to run out!
translation.ko: 이제 곧 너희의 운이 다할 날이 올 거다

translation.en: Tell them we're not afraid. Tell them, next time,
translation.ko: 우린 겁 안 난다고 전해 다음엔

translation.en: they won't need to worry about coming for us.
Because we're gonna come for them.
